0.5.0.name: wordpress/shortcut
0.5.0.description:
Shortcut is a plugin that allows you to use your own short URL service, such as those found at TinyURL and bit.ly from within Wordpress using your own domain. Shortcut allows you to create short URL’s for all of your posts and pages as well as external URL’s allowing you to easily manage all your links. You can also view how many clicks each short URL get from within the Shortcut panel.

Shortcut also allows you to hide/mask any target URL’s by simply adding the corresponding file extension to the Shortcut URL.
